title: Simulated Mars base opens in NW China's Gansu
content: A staff worker (back) introduces space suit to students at "Mars Base 1 Camp" in Jinchang City of northwest China's Gansu Province on April 17, 2019. The simulated Mars base opened Wednesday in Gansu, aiming to popularize science and boost interest in space exploration. (Xinhua/Fan Peishen)
